content.rendered:
Directed by Sekhar Kammula

Written by Sekhar Kammula

Cast Naga Chaitanya Akkineni(Revanth). Sai Pallavi(Mounica). Rajeev Kanakala(Narasimham). Easwari Rao(Manamma). Devayani(Mounica’s mother). Uttej(Police Officer). Chakrapani Ananda(Mounica’s father). Gangavva(Gangavva). Duvvasi Mohan(Bank Officer).Bhanu Teja.Mounika Madigala.Mani Sai Azhar.Gowri Priya.Pamu Vignani.Praveen Prabhu.Tejaswi Kotha.Valli Swamy.Bhanu Prakash.Trishala.Mamatha Madigala. Srikanth Parkaala((as Srikanth Parhala)).Akshay Lagusani.Mohith Ram Sai.Venkata Ramanamurthy.Aravindha Valli.Saritha Anand.Shesha Brahmam.Bindu Chandramouli.Sivathmika.Divya Kanthi.Akul Reddy.Gowri Shankar.Vishnu Vimal.Surabhi Jayachandra.Praveen Kumar.Mohan Chowdary.Nirogi Vineel.Vinod.Harikrishna.Mahendra Talasani.Naga Mahesh.Anvesh Babu Gummadi. Naeem Ghefari((as Naeem Ghafari)).Youssef Hassanin. Krishna Penumarthi(Bank Customer)

Language Telugu

Producers Ajay Kaikala. Bhaskar Katakamshetty. Narayan Das Narang. Irla Srinivasa Rao. Puskur Ram Mohan Rao.

Production Amigos Creations. Sree Venkateswara Cinemas
